website_summaries.verdict: Kit ships with 4 different kinds of suture threads, so you can practice anything.
pros: Entire kit fits inside a comfortable carrying case, so you can practice anywhere
Includes 5 high-quality tools, so you can practice properly and prepare for exams
Suture pad attempts to provide the feeling of human skin while remaining durable
cons: Back of suture pad has a sticky substance that may collect dirt and hair

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase and super helpful!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! I’m currently a Physician Assistant student who plans on working in surgery and this kit is absolutely perfect for me. The silicone pad is just like real, human skin with a variety of different cuts to practice on! Not to mention, the many stainless steel tools it comes with is going to last a long time, which is super helpful as I don’t like constantly buying new tools to replace old, discolored ones. The leather case it comes in fits perfect in my purse/backpack and is discreet and durable. Highly recommend purchasing!!
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Good variety of sutures but needle breaks
customer_reviews.text: I liked that this was a good deal on a variety of practice tools that come in a nice case; however, the skin simulation tears easily (especially the subcutaneous layer) and one of the needles broke while I was using it. Unfortunately, it disappeared and my fear is if found, it will likely be located in someone's actual skin. I will update this review if I have better success with the kit in the future (I am learning, so I accept some of the fault), but I have not had such a poor experience with the actual thing. That being said, you can look for other suture kits, but I don't think there are many out there. Just be careful!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great resource for students to practice suturing at home
customer_reviews.text: Loving this suture kit so far! It has everything you need to start practicing your suture skills from wherever you want. It comes with several pre-cut suture threads and four different types of threads as well. This kit is perfect if you’re wanting to practice your skills or just get comfortable with the tools prior to having to learn this in a lab. Plus, it’s pretty fun and addicting. Everything seems to be good quality and the synthetic tissue can be used multiple times which is great for beginners
customer_reviews.author: natasha

customer_reviews.title: Best Suture Kit for the Money! I'm impressed!
customer_reviews.text: Whether you are in the OR, ER, or placing a central line in the critical care unit... one of the procedures you have to learn is suturing. Even so, I practiced my suture and ties on everything from raw chicken to bananas. This suture practice kit has all the tools you need to master the different type of sutures. The silicone pad actually feels like real skin. I recommend this to all medical, PA, nursing, dental students.
customer_reviews.author: Chasidy Delgado

customer_reviews.title: I recommend!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great entry-level kit for anyone looking to practice suture techniques. As a PA first assist of 5+ years I'd recommend this to anyone. For the cost, this kit has everything you need for anyone on a tight budget. It's so much better than using messy raw meat. I love how everything fits in a convenient leather case a well.
customer_reviews.author: Jomaco

customer_reviews.title: Quality equipment
customer_reviews.text: This product did an amazing job with great quality throughout the kit. I love the leather case that is able to hold everything because its so convenient. The pad has 3 lays that represents skin, fat, and muscle layers. All the tools were high quality stainless steel as well. So far I've had no problems with this product. I am very satisfied with this company and would recommend this to everyone!
customer_reviews.author: steven tran

customer_reviews.title: Really great and effective product!
customer_reviews.text: Learned how to suture recently and I've been on the hunt for an affordable kit to practice on. I'm so happy I found this one! The silicone pad has 3 layers of "tissue" thats like the real thing. Also comes with 4 types of different sutures which I can experiment with. Would definitely recommend this to anyone who is looking to improve their skills.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Great suturing practice kit
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised by the quality of this kit. All of the items and equipment are good quality and allows for a variety of suture practice. The practice pad is very comparable to real human flesh. I also enjoy how the tools seem to be very strong and durable. This is a great suturing practice kit.
customer_reviews.author: Chau Hua

customer_reviews.title: No Instruction Book
customer_reviews.text: I like the Kit but It needs a Instruction Book also.
customer_reviews.author: Karl Sweet

customer_reviews.title: Great for students!
customer_reviews.text: If you're a professional in the medical or health field in the market for a new kit, look no future! This kit has everything you need from large suture pad to a variety of suture types you can practice with. Love the convenient leather carrying case. Spectacular kit to help you get started. As a student, I would to like keep mastering my skills at suturing and this is an amazing product to do so!
customer_reviews.author: LaMonte KaBlonte

customer_reviews.title: Nice work Ikigai Tech!
customer_reviews.text: This is actually a pretty cool suturing kit. Got it for my son for nursing school. It comes with everything shown in the picture with plenty of sutures and tools to use. Wish I had this back in the day. Recommend for students going into healthcare, veterinary care, or military training (medics).
customer_reviews.author: Nick T.

customer_reviews.title: Use on a leveled surface
customer_reviews.text: This is a great practice kit and affordably priced. For a synthetic material, it's about as close to real skin as you're going to get. Had no issues with sutures with the silicone material. I especially like the stand that comes with the pad so it's not sliding around while you're trying to work.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Great portable product
customer_reviews.text: I recommend this kit, its one of the best ways to practice at an affordable price. It's so portable because everything fits in the leather case and I can bring it anywhere if I want to practice. It's much cleaner than the traditional route of suturing. Ikigai Tech has the best customer service I've dealt with in a wild. Don't hesitate to jump on this!
customer_reviews.author: sanfou

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I got this for a relative who is a medical student. She is happy with it and likes the many pieces supplies. The suture threads come in different polypropylene, polyester, silk, and nylon. The pad mimics the real thing in texture and layers. This includes a broad set of tools.
customer_reviews.author: Angelika

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product for any medical student! I’m new to suturing and this is a great kit to start with. It has everything you need. I also love how affordable it is. I would recommend it to my peers and anyone else starting in the field.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda

customer_reviews.title: High quality suture kit. Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product and would buy again. It contained all the sutures needed and great for practice on my free time. My favorite is the leather all in one case! It helped me prepare so well. I recommend this kit to everyone training in a field where they will suture often.
customer_reviews.author: Tare

customer_reviews.title: Great for Practice! Amazing Quality!
customer_reviews.text: Came with everything I needed to practice my suturing techniques. I love how theres a variety of suture types and sizes. The large pad feels like real tissue. All the instruments were well put together! This has been a very helpful buy AND it’s affordable!
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for practice
customer_reviews.text: Great for practice! Only reason for 4/5 is because the needle holder could be a little better in quality but worth it for the money. The little case that it comes with is nice, very secure when storing.
customer_reviews.author: Ally

customer_reviews.title: More than expected!
customer_reviews.text: There was a lot more offered in this kit. I wasn't sure if I should make the purchase or not because there were barely any reviews, but I'm glad that I bought. Happier than I thought. Another plus is that it comes with a leather case!
customer_reviews.author: Isaac

customer_reviews.title: Worth the buy
customer_reviews.text: I love this practice suture kit if you want to have a more skilled technique. I'm currently a medical student and this kit is amazing. I love how high quality the pad and tool kits are. I've sutured and cut the stitches over 20+ times and it still look pristine. This kit has 4 different types of sutures you can practice with as well. Definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Jojo

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: It looks much better in person. Very affordable and high quality. I was surprised with the silicone pad as it felt very realistic. Its definitely has given me a lot more confidence in my sutures. I will be recommending this to my classmates! Cheers!
customer_reviews.author: Jared Jaenke

customer_reviews.title: Recommended!
customer_reviews.text: I’m still new to suturing so I definitely needed something to train on. One of my teachers recommended I get more practice. I don't like working with chicken and bananas. I love how this kit came with 4 suture threads so I can practice with a variety. I was able to master the primary knots and became much more efficient. thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Conventional suture kit that works!
customer_reviews.text: Very useful set of tools & handy. This kit is an essential of any medical students. Very durable, portable and the sticky bottom makes life so much easier when trying to suture. Delighted with the quality!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!!
customer_reviews.text: All in all a great product! The pre-cut skin is a great practice tool. The types of sutures, needle driver, and cutting blades are all perfect for beginners. It'd be a great gift for students and practicing clinicians!
customer_reviews.author: Alain B.

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: Very useful set of tools & handy. This kit is an essential of any medical students. Very durable, portable and the sticky bottom makes life so much easier when trying to suture. Delighted with the quality!
customer_reviews.author: Nghia Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: I like how organized this kit is. I usually misplace and lose things but all the tools fits in the case. Love how it comes with everything you need which is one of the main reasons I went with this brand. The price was very good for what you get. As a broke college student this was definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: Good but weak pad.
customer_reviews.text: The thread cuts the foam when shutting the wund. The kit is good but that is something it should not hapen.
customer_reviews.author: Fernando Pendino

customer_reviews.title: Great Start
customer_reviews.text: I'm so happy that I bought this kit! It is a great basic tool kit set. I love the high quality skin simulation silicone pad. I was able to practice a variety of suture knots and techniques with the variety types of threads they have. I also made my own cuts of different shapes, depth and width. I would recommend this to any one who wants to practice their suturing skills!
customer_reviews.author: Gentlemanintraining

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorites!
customer_reviews.text: I currently love practicing sutures whenever I have any free time. It’s super relaxing to me and this simple and easy kit has provided me with everything I need to practice suturing. You can see the attention to detail to this kit and definitely worth the money! Even for those who aren’t in the healthcare field and is curious about the complexity of suturing can easily maneuver through this kit! Will definitely recommend to my colleagues and peers!!!
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: Great for PA students
customer_reviews.text: I am currently in the last few months of my first year of PA school. I was nervous about going into my clinical rotations especially surgery and ER. This kit helped relieve some of my nerves. The tools are perfect for practicing suturing different techniques. Perfect for any pre-med training!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

product_meta.title: Suture Practice Kit for Training, Advance Suture Pad with Pre-Cut Wounds, Suturing tools, 4 Types Thread and Storage Case; Medical, Dental, Nursing,Veterinary Students. Demonstration & Educational Use
product_meta.description:
Try Out The Best Suture Practice Kit

We strive to be your partner in the scientific journey you are taking and inspire confidence in your adventure of exploration. We aim to understand your key application challenges and provide the right tools you need.

Are you a physician assistant, nursing, medical, veterinary student? Not only this is a perfect gift but also a perfect opportunity to practice your suturing skills.



✅Most Robust Skin-Like Silicone with precut wounds for over 100 uses! The pad is composed of non-toxic silicone, demonstrating the skin, fat, muscle layers. Our suture pad simulates the human skin quality, creating an authentic suturing experience. The perfect alternative to animal skin.

✅We have a new sticky base to the product, we understand how frustrating it gets can get when it moves when suturing. Our new innovation will keep it as steady as possible

✅New and improved all-in-one Leather Case! Allowing you for easy transportation and convenient use wherever you are.

✅Superior quality variety set of FOUR different types of threads for any occasion!

✅Incredible 25 piece tool kit normally used in medical field is made of premium grade stainless steel!

✅Designed to train students, teachers professionals in their fields!



We dedicate ourselves to making sure you receive the best experience possible, therefore if you have ANY problems whatsoever, we promise to make things right!
feature_bullets: ✔ COMPLETE WITH EVERYTHING YOU NEED: Unlike the other products you see out there, this incredible compact kit provides you with all the tools you require to discover your suturing talents. This suture practice kit consists of 4 types of suture threads (16-pack), Adson forceps, hegar needle holder, iris scissors, mosquito forceps, scalpel handle, scalpel blade (3-pack), and a suture pad. Conveniently arranged and tucked away in a compact leather travel case with zipper - 25 pieces

✔ HIGH QUALITY VARIETY SET: 16 Sutures of FOUR multiple thread types to assist you to train suturing with an extensive variety of wounds ranging from enormous cuts down to extremely fine punctures. 3 Scalpel blades let you practice forming incisions and help you get accustomed to cutting.

✔ PERFECT FOR TRAINING: Made by Professionals for Professionals. Developed with your suturing needs in mind. Our suture pad is designed to imitate the anatomical structure of human tissue including skin, fat, and muscle, our suture pad provides the best simulation possible. New and improved mesh layer for durability for up to 100 uses.

✔ STAINLESS STEEL KIT: Our elite level craftsmanship in the manufacturing of this product. We utilize top quality high grade non rust stainless steel to create our premium instruments. Complete for anyone looking for an affordable and durable dissecting kit tool available online.

✔ TEST BY ALL KINDS OF CLINICIANS: APPROVED BY STUDENTS - Our product has been tested by medical students and teachers, and improved with their feedback to give you the best experience possible! They are the primary users of our product, so who to trust if not them!
